content.question: A researcher examined the correlation between gender and the number of birds in Indonesia. Which of the following scatterplots illustrates the weakest correlation coefficient this correlation could show?

choices.label: The figure shows a scatterplot in the first quadrant of a plane. The points begin in the lower left part of the scatterplot. They are loosely clustered and trend upward and to the right until they end in the upper far right part of the scatterplot.

The figure shows a scatterplot in the first quadrant of a plane. The points begin in the center left part of the scatterplot. They are not clustered and extend rightward until they end in the right part of the scatterplot.

The figure shows a scatterplot in the first quadrant of a plane. The points begin in the upper left part of the scatterplot. They are tightly clustered and trend steeply downward and to the right until they end in the lower middle part of the scatterplot, just above the horizontal axis.

The figure shows a scatterplot in the first quadrant of a plane. The points begin in the upper left part of the scatterplot. They are loosely clustered and trend downward and to the right until they end in the lower right part of the scatterplot.

content.answer: The figure shows a scatterplot in the first quadrant of a plane. The points begin in the center left part of the scatterplot. They are not clustered and extend rightward until they end in the right part of the scatterplot.

skill.text: 3.C: Interpret quantitative or qualitative inferential data from a given table, graph, chart, figure, or diagram.
